page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT IN KILREA
page.content: {EMLOYMENT:}I AM AN EIGHTEEN YEAR OLD YOUTH AND I HAVE BEEN UNEMPLOYED FOR ONE AND A HALF YEARS.I WOULD LOVE TO HAVE A JOB. {EDUCATION:}I ATTENDED ST.PAUL'S SECONDARY SCHOOL AND I LEFT WHEN I WAS SIXTEEN.I DID THE SECONDARY CERTIFICATE IN EDUCATION. {WORK EXPERIENCE:}FOR A YEAR I WORKED AS A TRAINEE BARMAN BUT AFTER THE YEAR WAS UP I WAS NOT KEPT ON.I LIKED WORKING IN A PUB.SINCE LEAVING THE PUB I HAVE NOT WORKED. {AMBITION:}I WOULD LIKE A JOB ASSOCIATED WITH ART OR DRAWING.WHEN AT SCHOOL I LIKED ART AND CRAFTS.I WOULD LIKE TO WORK AS A DRAUGHTSMAN.
